author: Aaron Holmes
title: Singapore is using a high-tech surveillance app to track the coronavirus, keeping schools and businesses open. Here's how it works.
description: Singapore is using a smartphone app to monitor the spread of the coronavirus by tracking people who may have been exposed. The government's high-tech approach has helped keep COVID-19 in check on the island nation — schools and businesses have not had to shut…
content:
Singapore has accomplished what few nations could: It has successfully contained the spread of COVID-19 within its borders.
The island nation has confirmed just under 600 cases total. Its borders have closed, but Singapore hasn't had to implement a shutdown … [+1369 chars]
